article: wimbledon semi-finalist milos raonic and 19-year-old australian nick kyrgios will make their debuts at the aegon championships at queen 's club this summer .

canada 's raonic , ranked no 6 in the world , lost to roger federer in last year 's wimbledon semi-final while kyrgios burst onto the scene with a shock fourth-round victory over two-time champion rafael nadal .
the duo will join nadal , andy murray , stan wawrinka , marin cilic and defending champion grigor dimitrov at queen 's , which begins on june 15 .
croatia 's milos raonic in action during his run to the wimbledon semi-finals last summer .
nick kyrgios was responsible for the biggest upset at sw19 last year when he beat rafael nadal .
abstract: milos raonic , last year 's wimbledon semi-finalist , will play at queen 's club .
australian nick kyrgios will also make his debut in west london .
kyrgios knocked rafael nadal out of wimbledon in a huge shock last year .
